sentences.sentence: I mentioned the Mont Nitro bags in the main Sleeping bag section.
sentences.translation: 我刚才提到蒙特塞·拉特硝基袋，在主要睡袋节。

sentences.sentence: This is the easiest way to get into the awesome world of nitro drifting!
sentences.translation: 这是最简单的方式进入可怕的世界硝基漂流！

sentences.sentence: We've improved the looks of our famous line of nitro stadium trucks as well!
sentences.translation: 我们已经改善了期待我们的著名的路线，硝基大球场的卡车，以及！
